name: Chrono Ark: Astra Constellatio Mod
description:
Astra Constellatio Mod v0.7
Warnings:
-This mod makes maps bigger so game will be a bit heavier

-This mod is made for veteran players mostly, but if you're a newbie and like a real challenge you can test it too

-This mod is very based on my own world of fantasy, so its recommended for people above 14 yo. As it has a small amount of light gore and some sexual innuendos but its nothing really NSFW so you can play safe and with open mind as there is nothing really explicit so you're good to go.

-It's recomended that you have Helia and Selena unlocked That out of the way : ==================
